subject: Basketball
College Athletics
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: The top-ranked Huskies, avenging their only loss of the season, never trailed in dismantling No. 4 Rutgers, 66-46, to clinch the Big East Conference regular-season championship.
snippet: The top-ranked Huskies, avenging their only loss of the season, never trailed in dismantling No. 4 Rutgers, 66-46, to clinch the Big East Conference regular-season championship.
